channel.title: Some Information about RSC Servers
channel.description:
Hi there. I'm just looking for a little bit of information on how the "private server scene" is for RSC. I'm just wondering a few things:
1:- Is it a full world map, or make-believe places like in RS2 PS. 2:- Considering RSC is not updated, are private servers close to realistic, or a long way off?
I'm just wondering these as I've never tried doing anything with a Classic server before but I would be very interested if they are indeed scapelike.

item.title: Some Information about RSC Servers
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“eambo, post:4, topic:269527”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=355705.msg2722327#msg2722327 date=1238079567]
RSCAngel would be where you wanna go, and yes most of these servers are very realistic.
[/quote]

Personally, I think it depends on how much the server has been edited, etc.

For a more realistic server, that is almost, if not the closest thing to the real RSC, then check out RSCA ^^

Yong min - thanks a lot for the reply. I’ll have a look at it now! And xEnt also, thank you very much for the information, it’s good to know RSC isn’t stuck in the endless loop of programming the same features that RS2 has got itself stuck in =([/quote]

You’re more than welcome, eambo

Read full topic

item.title: Some Information about RSC Servers
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

yea RSC servers are more realistic in server wise then rs2 servers. Just like yong said if you wanna play a rsc server that is like the closest thing to rsc would be Rsca.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Information about RSC Servers
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

Well its all a game trying to become close to the real thing so there isnt that much to program unlike rs2 where there is far more things to add/edit

Read full topic
